text: Michael Glawogger (3 December 1959 - 23 April 2014) was an Austrian movie director, screenwriter, cinematographer and actor. His best known movies were Megacities (1998), Workingman's Death (2005) and Whores' Glory (2011). He was born in Graz. Glawogger died from malaria on 23 April 2014 during a movie production in Liberia. He was 54. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1959 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Austrian movie actors Category:Austrian movie directors Category:Austrian screenwriters Category:Cinematographers Category:Deaths from malaria Category:Writers from Graz
title: Michael Glawogger
